name: 王謹誠
objective:
車輛空氣動力學理論基礎，空氣動力學特性，汽車空氣動力風阻與特性，汽車行駛安全與舒適，汽車行駛噪音與防治方法，及車輛空氣動力設計要點。
Introduction of automobile aerodynamics, Some aerodynamics fundamentals, Aerodynamic drag of passenger cars, Safety and comfort, Mechanisms of noise generation and transmission, and Design features.
